name: The Rise (fraedrik)
description:
Synopsis:

You (a chap named Mr. Pitman) are mining your own business when you dig far too deep and disturb the gentle crust of what turns out to be not just an intricate system of caverns, but a previously dormant volcano. To escape, place a Platform under Mr. Pitman, jump from it, and place it again. Simple! That is, if lava was your only concern...

You've got One Minute. One Life. One Platform. Don't waste 'em away.

Controls:
  • A, Left Arrow: Move Left
  • D, Right Arrow: Move right
  • Space: Jump!
  • Left Mouse Click: Place the Platform.

Pro tip: Pros always play in Fullscreen!

Pro tip: Don't place the Platform too high, or else...

Credits:
